item.title: Tidy Tuesday Income Data and plotting themes
item.description: A while since I've completed a tidy tuesday challenge here so to get back in the swing of things I've chosen a fairly simple plot of income equality by race and focused on altering the default these to try to create a more striking visual effect for the data. Code The code is pretty straight forward to create the chart. The key effect I was going for here was to alter the theme to make a more striking visual.
